Key Match Events: Mohamed Bayo gave Guinea the lead against Cameroon
François Kamano was sent off in first-half stoppage time
Fabrice Ondoa started in goal for Cameroon due to travel problems for André Onana
Frank Magri's header levelled things up six minutes into the second half
Guinea defended well to hold Cameroon to a 1-1 draw
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cameroon were missing injured captain Vincent Aboubakar
Others: The match was held in Yamoussoukro
